sourcesContent:
import styles from './OverlayBomb.module.css'; import image_bomb from '../../assets/images/bomb.png' import image_light from '../../assets/images/light.png' import image_money from '../../assets/images/five.png' import icons_defuse from '../../assets/icons/icon.svg' function OverlayBomb({scope}) { return (

Danger ahead!

You're on a Bomb Square! You hit a bomb
and lose all rewards from this field...

{scope}

...or defuse it and save your run!

); } export default OverlayBomb;
